definitions.description: A preset borrowing limit associated with a credit or charge card.

constantValues: A preset borrowing limit associated with a credit or charge card.

members.name: accountingClassification
members.description: Indicates whether the financial holding is an asset or a liability.

members.name: balance
members.description: The balance or value of the financial holding in the original currency of the financial holding.

constantValues: The balance or value of the financial holding in the original currency of the financial holding.

members.name: balance_Base
members.description: Value of the balance in base currency.

constantValues: Value of the balance in base currency.

members.name: balanceDefault
members.description: Balance converted to default currency of the system.

constantValues: Balance converted to default currency of the system.

members.name: balanceExchangerate
members.description: Exchange rate between the transaction currency of the financial holding and the default currency (1 unit of transaction currency = X units of default currency).

constantValues: Exchange rate between the transaction currency of the financial holding and the default currency (1 unit of transaction currency = X units of default currency).

members.name: creditLimit
members.description: The total credit limit available to the customer on the credit card.

constantValues: The total credit limit available to the customer on the credit card.

members.name: creditlimit_Base
members.description: Value of the credit limit in base currency.

constantValues: Value of the credit limit in base currency.

members.name: creditLimit_default
members.description: Credit limit converted to default currency of the system.

constantValues: Credit limit converted to default currency of the system.

members.name: delinquencyStatus
members.description: Indication of whether the customer's loan is delinquent or not (i.e. whether any payments are overdue or not).

constantValues: Indication of whether the customer's loan is delinquent or not (i.e. whether any payments are overdue or not).

members.name: financialHoldingCategory
members.description: The category of the financial holding (Accounts, Long-term savings, Investments, Loans and Lines or credit).

members.name: integrationKey
members.description: Used by the system integrator to uniquely define the data record .

constantValues: Used by the system integrator to uniquely define the data record .

members.name: interestrate
members.description: The rate of interest associated with the line of credit, to be charged to the customer during a defined period/term.

constantValues: The rate of interest associated with the line of credit, to be charged to the customer during a defined period/term.

members.name: lastPaymentDueDate
members.description: The date on which the last payment was due on the credit balance.

constantValues: The date on which the last payment was due on the credit balance.

members.name: lastStatementBalance
members.description: The total amount due on the card per the last statement.

constantValues: The total amount due on the card per the last statement.

members.name: laststatementbalance_Base
members.description: Value of the last statement balance in base currency.

constantValues: Value of the last statement balance in base currency.

members.name: lastStatementBalance_default
members.description: Last statement balance converted to default currency of the system.

constantValues: Last statement balance converted to default currency of the system.

members.name: lastStatementDate
members.description: The date on which the last statement was issued on the card.

constantValues: The date on which the last statement was issued on the card.

members.name: minimumPaymentDue
members.description: The minimum amount that is required for payment towards the card based on the monthly payment percentage of the outstanding balance.

constantValues: The minimum amount that is required for payment towards the card based on the monthly payment percentage of the outstanding balance.

members.name: minimumpaymentdue_Base
members.description: Value of the minimum payment due in base currency.

constantValues: Value of the minimum payment due in base currency.

members.name: minimumPaymentDue_default
members.description: Minimum payment due converted to default currency of the system.

constantValues: Minimum payment due converted to default currency of the system.

members.name: monthlyPaymentPercentage
members.description: The percentage of the outstanding balance that must be paid by the customer as the 'minimum payment' by the next payment date.

constantValues: The percentage of the outstanding balance that must be paid by the customer as the 'minimum payment' by the next payment date.

members.name: nextPaymentDate
members.description: The date on which the next payment towards the financial holding is due. This can be applied to lines of credit and loans.

constantValues: The date on which the next payment towards the financial holding is due. This can be applied to lines of credit and loans.

members.name: nextStatementDate
members.description: The date on which the next statement is expected to issue on the card.

constantValues: The date on which the next statement is expected to issue on the card.

members.name: balanceDisplayValue
members.description: Display value shows the balance of a financial holding in accordance with the type of the financial holding. Financial holdings that are typically defined as a customer's liabilities (such as lines of credit and loans) are presented as positive when the customer owes money to the financial institution (that is, a loan with an accounting value of -500 will appear as 500). In the inverse case: the display value will be negative for debit balances on a credit financial holding (such as overpayment of a credit card), or overdrawn account.

constantValues: Display value shows the balance of a financial holding in accordance with the type of the financial holding. Financial holdings that are typically defined as a customer's liabilities (such as lines of credit and loans) are presented as positive when the customer owes money to the financial institution (that is, a loan with an accounting value of -500 will appear as 500). In the inverse case: the display value will be negative for debit balances on a credit financial holding (such as overpayment of a credit card), or overdrawn account.

members.name: balancedisplayvalue_Base
members.description: Value of the balance display value in base currency.

constantValues: Value of the balance display value in base currency.
